mods.note: ORGANISATION of COMMUNICATIONS in SUMMER & AUTUMN 1916. 12

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘12. Organisation of Communications in Summer & Autumn 1916’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:195 x 100 mm, on sheet 236 x 154 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun.Distinctive Features:Sketch map of Lower Mesopotamia from Samarra down to the Persian Gulf produced to illustrate the British campaign in Mesopotamia showing communication features across the region with marching routes and different track gauges railway lines indicated.
